00001 subroutine cleanup
00002   use physvars
00003   implicit none
00004   include 'mpif.h'
00005   integer :: ierr
00006   if (my_rank==0) write(0,*) 'User-abort of program: cleaning up ...'

00008   call MPI_FINALIZE(ierr)
